name: better-folding-plus
description: Improve the folding experience in VS Code

betterFoldingPlus.foldClosingBrackets.markdownDescription: Include closing brackets like `}` and `]` in the folding range.

betterFoldingPlus.foldClosingTags.markdownDescription:
Include closing tags like `` and `

` in the folding range.

betterFoldingPlus.collapsedBodyContent.markdownDescription:
Determines what content replaces the collapsed body text. 

- `count`: Shows the number of folded lines (e.g., `⋯ 3 lines ⋯`).
- `content`: Shows the content of the first line of the body (e.g., ` return value' `).
- `none`: Uses the default ellipsis (`…`).

betterFoldingPlus.collapsedMaxBodyLength.markdownDescription: The maximum number of characters to show in the collapsed body text. Only applies if `#betterFoldingPlus.collapsedBodyContent#` is `content`.

betterFoldingPlus.showFoldedBrackets.markdownDescription:
Shows brackets like `{` and `}` in the collapsed text. Only applies if `#betterFoldingPlus.foldClosingBrackets#` is `enabled`. 

Example: `function example() {…}`.

betterFoldingPlus.showFunctionParameters.markdownDescription:
Shows the function parameters in the collapsed text for functions with params in multiple lines. Only applies if `#betterFoldingPlus.showFoldedBrackets#` is `enabled`. 

Example: `function example(firstParam, secondParam) {…}`.

betterFoldingPlus.chainFoldingRanges.markdownDescription:
On folding a range, fold all the ranges that start on the same line where the original range ends. Only applies if `#betterFoldingPlus.showFoldedBrackets#` is `enabled`. 

Enabled: `function example(…) {…}`. 

Disabled: `function example(…) {`.

betterFoldingPlus.showOnlyRegionsDescrip.markdownDescription:
Only shows the region description in the collapsed text. 

Example: `// #region some text`.

Becomes: `some text`.

betterFoldingPlus.showObjectPreviews.markdownDescription:
Show the first property in the collapsed text of an object literal. Only applies if `#betterFoldingPlus.showFoldedBrackets#` is `enabled`. 

Example: `{ id:'123',… }`.

betterFoldingPlus.excludedLanguages.markdownDescription:
List of languages to exclude from folding. 

Example: `['javascript', 'typescript']`.

commands.title: Better Folding: Create Zen Folds Around Selection
